languages.text: "Не падала она! И не все померли. Офицеры, что там были, но только ног-рук лишились, рассказывают, будто дверь в отсек захлопнулась, когда их отряд сквозь нее проходил".

traits.locale_text: "Не падала она! И не все померли. Офицеры, что там были, но только ног-рук лишились, рассказывают, будто дверь в отсек захлопнулась, когда их отряд сквозь нее проходил".

languages.text: "It didn't collapse! And not all of them died — lots of them lost an arm or a leg though. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."
languages.original_text: "Не падала она! И не все померли. Офицеры, что там были, но только ног-рук лишились, рассказывают, будто дверь в отсек захлопнулась, когда их отряд сквозь нее проходил".

traits.locale_text: "It didn't fall! And not all of them died. The officers who were there but only lost their arms and legs say the compartment door slammed shut right when their group was going through it."
"It didn't fall! And not all of them died. The officers who were there but only lost their arms and legs say the compartment door slammed shut right when their group was going through it."
"It didn't fall! And not all of them died, many — maimed. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."
"It didn't fall! And not all of them died, many — maimed. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."

"It didn't collapse! And not all of them died — lots of them lost an arm or a leg though. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."

"It didn't collapse! And not all of them died — lots of them lost an arm or a leg though. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."

languages.text: « Elle n'est pas tombée ! Et puis, tous ne sont pas morts... même s'ils sont nombreux à avoir perdu un bras ou une jambe. D'après les officiers qui ont survécu, la porte du compartiment s'est violemment refermée au moment précis où leur groupe la franchissait. »
languages.original_text: "It didn't collapse! And not all of them died — lots of them lost an arm or a leg though. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."

traits.locale_text: « Elle n'est pas tombée ! Et puis, tous ne sont pas morts, il y en a beaucoup qui ont été... mutilés. D'après les officiers qui ont survécu, la porte du compartiment s'est violemment refermée au moment précis où leur groupe la franchissait. »

languages.text: “门根本没倒！而且也不是所有人都被砸死了，很多人只是断了条胳膊或者没了条腿而已。幸存的军官说，他们的小组通过的时候，门突然关上了。”
languages.original_text: "It didn't collapse! And not all of them died — lots of them lost an arm or a leg though. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."

traits.locale_text: “门根本没倒！而且也不是所有人都被砸死了，很多人只是……残废了而已。幸存的军官说，他们的小组通过的时候，门突然关上了。”

languages.text: "Es ist nicht eingestürzt! Und es sind auch nicht alle gestorben ... allerdings haben viele einen Arm oder ein Bein verloren. Die überlebenden Offiziere sagen, dass die Modultür genau in dem Moment zugekracht ist, als ihre Gruppe durchgegangen ist."
languages.original_text: "It didn't collapse! And not all of them died — lots of them lost an arm or a leg though. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."

traits.locale_text: "Sie ist nicht umgefallen! Und es sind auch nicht alle gestorben, manche sind nur verstümmelt. Die überlebenden Offiziere sagen, dass die Modultür genau in dem Moment zugekracht ist, als ihre Gruppe durchgegangen ist."

languages.text: «¡No se cayó! Y no murieron todos, aunque muchos sí quedaron lisiados. Los oficiales que sobrevivieron dicen que la puerta del compartimento se cerró de pronto justo cuando estaban cruzándola».
languages.original_text: "It didn't collapse! And not all of them died — lots of them lost an arm or a leg though. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."

traits.locale_text: «¡No se cayó! Y no murieron todos, la mayoría quedaron lisiados. Los oficiales que sobrevivieron dicen que la puerta del compartimento se cerró de pronto justo cuando estaban cruzándola».

languages.text: 「崩れたんじゃない！それに生存者はいる…ほとんどが手か足を失くしたけどな。生き残った士官の話では、一行が通過しようとしたまさにその瞬間、区画の扉がバタンと閉まったらしいぞ」
languages.original_text: "It didn't collapse! And not all of them died — lots of them lost an arm or a leg though. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."

traits.locale_text: 「崩れたんじゃない！それに生存者はいる…ほとんどが手か足を失くしたけどな。生き残った士官の話では、一行が通過しようとしたまさにその瞬間、区画の扉がバタンと閉まったらしいぞ」

languages.text: "Yıkılmamış! Çoğu da ölmemiş ama kollarını ya da bacaklarını kaybetmişler. Hayatta kalan subaylar, kompartıman kapısının grup tam geçerken kapandığını söylüyor."
languages.original_text: "It didn't collapse! And not all of them died — lots of them lost an arm or a leg though. The surviving officers say the compartment door slammed shut precisely when their group was going through it."

traits.locale_text: "Yıkılmamış! Çoğu da ölmemiş ama kollarını ya da bacaklarını kaybetmişler. Hayatta kalan subaylar kompartıman kapısının tam grup geçerken kapandığını söylüyor."
